env._NOTE_2_PROVIDERS: Supports: Voyage (1024 dims), OpenAI (1536/3072 dims), HF Local (768 dims, no API needed)
env._NOTE_3_AUTO_DETECTION: Provider priority: VOYAGE_API_KEY -> OPENAI_API_KEY -> HF Local fallback
env._NOTE_4_EMBEDDINGS_PROVIDER: Set to: 'auto' (default), 'voyage', 'openai', or 'hf-local' to force specific provider
env._NOTE_5_GET_VOYAGE_KEY: Get Voyage key: https://dash.voyageai.com/api-keys (recommended, 8% better than OpenAI)
env._NOTE_7_LOCAL_EMBEDDINGS: For offline/free: set EMBEDDINGS_PROVIDER=hf-local (uses @xenova/transformers, no API needed)
